short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to increase your knowledge.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BrainWave: Trivia Breaks is a Chrome extension designed to help you learn and have fun during your browsing breaks. With a wide range of categories to choose from, you can test your knowledge and discover new facts while taking a break from your daily tasks.

Features:

- Customizable quiz intervals: Set the time interval between quizzes to suit your preferences.
- Multiple categories: Choose from a variety of categories, including General Knowledge, Film, Music, Science, History, and more.
- Audio toggle: Enable or disable audio notifications for quiz popups.
- Easy-to-use interface: Simple and intuitive design for a seamless quiz experience.

How it works:

Once installed, BrainWave: Trivia Breaks will periodically display a quiz popup based on your chosen time interval and category. Answer the multiple-choice questions and see if you got it right! 

Click on the extension icon in your browser, or navigate to the extension's Options page to set your interval and trivia category. Upon install, BrainWave defaults to general range of questions, the interval is set to 20 minutes, and the alarm sound is off.

Coming Soon:
-Track your correct and incorrect answers
-Share your scores with your friends across social media
